DOC.brief_summary: The goals of this study are to replicate previous findings of genetic predictors of response to clozapine and other antipsychotic drugs.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Outcome in Schizophrenia Through Identification of Genetic Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Patients with the diagnoses of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder, and bipolar disorder or major depression with psychotic features, or volunteers with no history of a psychotic disorder. Patients with DSMIV diagnoses other than schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder, and bipolar disorder or major depression with psychotic features.
